receiveSignature(uint256,bytes).details: This function is intended to be called to provide a signature for the given `requestID`.

params.requestID: The unique identifier of the request associated with the signature.
params.signature: The cryptographic signature of the message, provided as a byte array.

receiveSignature(uint256,bytes).notice: Receives a signature for a specified request.
